plugins.name: The One Ring
plugins.bigPicture: The foundational governance layer for every Olytic system. Brand voice, company strategy, HR, and security policies — defined once, enforced everywhere. Every other plugin assumes this one is installed. You cannot disable it. That's the point.

capabilities.text: Write content in Olytic's brand voice
Review tone, messaging, and ICP alignment
Check competitive positioning angles
Reference company vision, OKRs, and strategic priorities
Look up HR policies, PTO, work norms
Verify data handling and security rules
Run a scored brand compliance audit on any content
Deep multi-dimensional audit of pages, emails, proposals against all brand standards

skills.name: Brand Standards
skills.desc: Voice rules, messaging pillars, ICP definition, competitive positioning, design preferences

skills.name: Company Strategy
skills.desc: Vision, philosophy, current priorities, engagement models, business stage context

skills.name: HR Policies
skills.desc: Culture, communication norms, work hours, PTO, onboarding

skills.name: Security Policies
skills.desc: Data classification, client data rules, AI usage policies, credential management

commands.name: /brand-check
commands.desc: Review any content against brand standards with a scored compliance report

agents.name: brand-compliance-reviewer
agents.desc: Multi-dimensional audit of any content against all brand and quality standards

guardrails: Never write fluffy, generic thought leadership — no "rapidly evolving landscapes"
Never use hollow superlatives: "best-in-class", "world-class", "cutting-edge"
Never position Olytic as a consulting firm or SaaS vendor
Never suggest AI replaces humans — always frame as amplification
Never be salesy or pushy — the expertise sells itself
No emojis in professional content
Security policies contain placeholders — update with actual policies before relying on them
HR policies contain placeholders — same deal

setup.name: Managed Scope
setup.desc: Installed org-wide. Users cannot disable it.

setup.name: Brand Standards
setup.desc: Fully populated with Olytic voice, messaging, ICP, competitive positioning

setup.name: Security Policies
setup.desc: Contains placeholders — needs real policy content

setup.name: HR Policies
setup.desc: Contains placeholders — needs real policy content

plugins.name: Content Strategist
plugins.bigPicture: The content operations engine. Handles everything from "what should we write?" to "how did it perform?" — website content production, GitHub push/pull, competitive research, GA4 analytics, and strategic planning. It's the Content O/G/O loop in plugin form.

capabilities.text: Create website pages — blog posts, landing pages, HTML templates
Plan what content to write next based on ICP journey gaps
Pull content from any Olytic GitHub repo to review or edit
Push new or updated content to any Olytic GitHub repo
Analyze content performance with GA4 data
Recommend what to write next based on gaps, ICP needs, and analytics
Research competitor content and find positioning angles only Olytic can own
Extract content ideas, ICP language, and objections from meeting notes

skills.name: Website Content
skills.desc: HTML templates, blog and landing page structures, formatting rules, SEO guidance

skills.name: Content Strategy
skills.desc: Pillars, ICP journey mapping, prioritization framework, GA4 integration, Content O/G/O loop

commands.name: /pull-content
commands.desc: Fetch a page from any Olytic GitHub repo to review or edit

commands.name: /push-content
commands.desc: Push new or updated content to any Olytic GitHub repo

commands.name: /content-performance
commands.desc: Analyze content performance using GA4 data

agents.name: content-strategist
agents.desc: Recommends what to write next based on ICP needs, content gaps, and GA4 data

agents.name: competitive-content-analyst
agents.desc: Researches competitor content and messaging, finds unique positioning angles

agents.name: meeting-notes-reviewer
agents.desc: Extracts content ideas, ICP language, objections from meeting notes

guardrails: Requires The One Ring — brand voice comes from there, not here
Content must map to one of three strategic purposes: build credibility, create visibility, enable conversion
Default to olytic-site repo for website content unless specified otherwise
GA4 Property ID 525690219 is hardcoded — update in content-strategy SKILL.md if it changes
Never publish content that hasn't been through /brand-check
Marketplace stages changes on feature branches — never auto-merges to main

setup.name: The One Ring (Dependency)
setup.desc: Required. Brand voice and strategy come from here.

setup.name: Content Strategy Skill
setup.desc: Pillars, ICP journey, prioritization framework loaded

plugins.name: Plugin Creator
plugins.bigPicture: The plugin that builds other plugins. A 7-question guided discovery, hardcoded Olytic generation standards, automatic telemetry in every output, and marketplace management. Works for internal Olytic plugins and client-facing ones. It's how we scale the architecture without losing quality.

capabilities.text: Walk through a 7-question discovery to gather plugin requirements
Generate a complete, ready-to-use plugin from discovery output
Stage marketplace updates on feature branches for review
Start the full plugin creation workflow from discovery through delivery
Add or update a plugin entry in the Olytic marketplace
Orchestrate the entire 6-phase build: discovery, planning, generation, review, delivery, marketplace

skills.name: Plugin Discovery
skills.desc: 7-question dynamic protocol: name, purpose, users, strategic questions, constraints, integrations, metrics

skills.name: Plugin Generation
skills.desc: Generates all plugin files from discovery output — includes reference templates for every component type

skills.name: Marketplace Management
skills.desc: Reads, diffs, and stages updates to the Olytic marketplace repo

commands.name: /create-plugin
commands.desc: Start guided plugin creation from discovery through delivery

commands.name: /update-marketplace
commands.desc: Add or update a plugin in the marketplace

agents.name: plugin-builder
agents.desc: End-to-end orchestrator for the 6-phase creation workflow

guardrails: Every generated plugin automatically includes a telemetry skill — no exceptions
Telemetry logs: usage events, version tags, constraint violations, user feedback
Marketplace changes are staged on feature branches — never auto-merged
Agentic best practices are embedded in every generated skill, agent, and command
Verification gates run after every write operation — no silent failures
No hallucination policy: if a file or data point isn't found, report "Not Found" immediately
Permission gates: confirm with user before destructive actions or 5+ simultaneous changes

setup.name: GitHub MCP Server
setup.desc: Required for marketplace management and repo operations

setup.name: Plugin Generation References
setup.desc: Templates, patterns, and best practices loaded
